descriptions:
['DescriptionWater’s Edge is ideally situated on its own canal and 800m promenade, in the heart of Yas Island. From modern studios to spacious three bedroom apartments, every home brings you the best of Yas at affordable prices, with beautiful views over the canal and beyond.
The destination will feature landscaped gardens, fully equipped gyms, pools and a jogging track that skirts the canal. Residents can also enjoy a waterfront boardwalk lined with cafes, restaurants and shops.
At Water’s Edge, everything moves at your own pace. So for those who enjoy action, the jogging and cycling trails, sport pitches and pools are ideal for getting your heart pumping. While the waterfront promenade brings a relaxed taste of the Med with its stylish selection of shops and restaurants.
About the developer
Aldar Properties PJSC is the leading real estate developer in Abu Dhabi, and through its iconic developments, it is one of the most well known in the United Arab Emirates, and the wider Middle East region. From its beginnings in 2005 through to today, Aldar continues to shape and enhance the urban fabric of the UAE’s Capital City in addition to other key areas of the Emirate of Abu Dhabi.']

descriptions: ['DescriptionIf you have always dreamed of living right on one of the best beaches in the world, reality can trump your dream at Jumeirah Beach Residence. Located just south Dubai Marina, JBR sits right on Arabian Gulf. It was designed to become one of the Middle East’s premier residential and vacation spots and it hasn’t let its initial target down! Beachfront cafes, world-class hotels, delightful shopping experience, excellent walking environment are here to entertain you.\nThis community is vibrant and dynamic both night and day, thanks to its key feature, a beautiful stretch of beach, that runs parallel to the community and includes parking, retail, and food options; in addition, The Walk at JBR is a series of restaurants, cafes, retail shops, beauty salons, and other convenience outlets built on the ground floor level of the residential towers\nThe swimming pools and gym are on the plaza level access, with the security entrance and access to retails shops, restaurants, and supermarkets, others']

Webridge properties is proud to introduce Al Maryah Vista, a high-end residential apartment building with facilities in Al Maryah Island in Abu Dhabi.

Al Maryah Vista features 772 luxurious apartments that offer an unparalleled level of convenience and amenities. Each apartment is delivered with a modern and fresh interior design.']

descriptions:
['DescriptionSE7EN RESIDENCES re-branded as SEVEN PALM 
THE ULTIMATE INVESTMENT OPPORTUNITY ON PALM JUMEIRAH
This project offers a 10% net ROI developer-backed guarantee for 5 years. 
A luxury hotel will be situated in the South tower of the Seven Palm project and the residences are located in the North tower. The towers are joined at the top by a stunning one-of-a-kind infinity pool and food and beverage outlets catering to the wants and needs of residents and visitors alike.
Nestled in between five-star DUKES The Palm and Oceana Residences on one side and Fairmont The Palm on the other. Walking distance to Nakheel Shopping Mall, Monorail stations, Al Itihad Park and Golden Mile Gallery.
Seven Palm offers breathtaking views of the Arabian Ocean, Marina skyline, the iconic Burj Al Arab and the Dubai Eye.
Studio apartments feature high quality furnishings maximizing space with flat screen televisions, fully equipped kitchens and floor-to-ceiling windows to maximize natural light and spacious balconies with spectacular views. 
One bedroom apartments feature high quality furnishings, separate air-conditioning controls, flat screen televisions in the living and master bedroom, guest toilet, en-suite master bedroom, walk-in wardrobes, fully equipped kitchens and spacious balconies with spectacular views.
Amenities include an Olympic sized rooftop infinity swimming pool in length, fully equipped gymnasium, beach access, lush landscaped gardens and secure underground parking. There will also be a wide selection of dining options available.
The investment opportunity is available on select studio and one bedroom hotel apartments. 
The project is sold off-plan with completion due by Q4 – 2020 to all nationalities on a freehold ownership basis. 
For your exclusive viewing visit our sales office located at DUKES The Palm hotel or call us TODAY!']

['DescriptionIntroducing IL PRIMO at Opera District developed by Emaar Properties
Residents of IL Primo live in prime luxury, w/ ready access to the facilities of Downtown Dubai and the various amenities the building complex offers
Property Details:
- Luxurious 5 bedroom penthouse apartment
- Price: 38,723,888 AED
- BUA: 11,000 square feet
- Expected High capital appreciation
- Estimated Completion by Sept 2023
- Flexible Payment Plan
- Easy access Dubai Mall and The Fountain
- Walking distance to various commercials, retails and restaurants
Building Amenities:
- Gymnasium
- Cigar lounge
- Games room
- Library
- Movie theatre
- Spa
The 77-storey Il Primo rises in the heart of the Opera District, only steps away from the iconic Dubai Opera. Residents of Il Primo experience a very luxurious, inclusive living amidst a vibrant district, elegantly designed to ensure the promotion of art and culture
Call our specialist for more information on +971555565772
Trusted Agency | Luxury Links Properties']

descriptions: ['DescriptionPark Heights II is stunning residential address perfectly set in Dubai Hills Estate. This 2 bedroom apartment is the best price in the market with a total area of 957 sq ft with fascinating view of the park and community.\xa0Boasting unobstructed views of the Burj Khalifa and Downtown Dubai, Park Heights takes community living to new heights overlooking the vibrant boulevard below. Apartment will be ready by March 2020.In close proximity to Downtown Dubai and other business, retail and tourism landmarks, Park Heights is easily accessible from Al Marabea Street. Cradled between Sheikh Mohammed Bin Zayed Road and Al Khail Road, you have a clear path from Park Heights to Dubai International Airport and the other emirates.Call on +97143233609 or visit www.providentestate.com for further details.Company name: Provident Real EstateRERA ORN: 1933 Address: Dubai, UAE']
